flowers.name: Rose
flowers.description: Roses are classic symbols of love and romance. With their velvety petals and sweet fragrance, they convey messages of affection and admiration.

flowers.name: Lily
flowers.description: Lilies are elegant and sophisticated flowers known for their beauty and grace. They symbolize purity, renewal, and the essence of femininity.

flowers.name: Tulip
flowers.description: Tulips are vibrant and cheerful flowers that herald the arrival of spring. They represent perfect love, elegance, and gracefulness.

flowers.name: Sunflower
flowers.description: Sunflowers are bold and bright flowers that symbolize happiness, warmth, and positivity. They turn their faces to the sun, radiating joy and optimism.

flowers.name: Daisy
flowers.color: White, Blue, Red, Yellow, Pink, Orange
flowers.description: Daisies are simple yet charming flowers that evoke feelings of innocence, purity, and cheerfulness. They symbolize new beginnings and the beauty of simplicity.

flowers.name: Lotus
flowers.description: The lotus flower symbolizes purity, enlightenment, and rebirth. It grows in muddy waters, yet remains unstained by its surroundings.

flowers.name: Orchid
flowers.description: Orchids are exotic and captivating flowers that represent love, luxury, and beauty. They are admired for their intricate blooms and delicate fragrance.

flowers.name: Hydrangea
flowers.description: Hydrangeas are elegant and versatile flowers that symbolize gratitude, sincerity, and heartfelt emotions. They are cherished for their lush blooms and vibrant colors.

flowers.name: Peony
flowers.description: Peonies are romantic and luxurious flowers that symbolize prosperity, honor, and compassion. They are prized for their large, fluffy blooms and sweet fragrance.

flowers.name: Chrysanthemum
flowers.description: Chrysanthemums are resilient and cheerful flowers that symbolize optimism, joy, and longevity. They are often associated with happiness and good fortune.

flowers.name: Crocus
flowers.description: Crocuses are delicate and charming flowers that herald the arrival of spring. They symbolize youthful joy, happiness, and new beginnings.

flowers.name: Iris
flowers.description: Irises are elegant and majestic flowers known for their striking beauty and unique shape. They symbolize wisdom, courage, and admiration.
